post.title: canon g10-red dot of light on dark photos?
post.content: ...amplified and clearly visible on close-ups. i took a close-up photo of a star in a dark night sky and on the mid-left hand side of the shot there was a red dot. what is this and why is it there? see here: http://freesurfer.tumblr.com/post/73...left-hand-side
